meanings.definition: A type of insect that feeds on coniferous trees.
meanings.sent1: The adelgids were damaging the pine trees in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Adelgids can cause harm to the spruce trees in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The adelgids seemed to be having a feast on the fir trees, like tiny picnic guests.
meanings.sent4: The adelgids clustered on the pine tree like a dark cloud, sucking its life away.
meanings.sent5: The adelgids swarmed the evergreen like a hungry army, leaving devastation in their wake.
